A discourse of earthquakes as they are supernatural and premonitory signs to a nation with a respect to what hath occurred in this year 1692, and some special reflections thereon : as also on that security and assurance of mind which is attainable in the light and power by the author of The fulfilling of the Scriptures. Fleming, Robert, 1630-1694.
[8], 128 p.
Printed for Thomas Parkhurst ... and Jonathan Robinson ..., London : 1693.
"The fulfilling of the Scriptures" was written by Robert Fleming the elder -- DNB. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
